Strongly recommend playing!

It's Portal. It's one of the reasons you're able to read this review or any other review on Steam. 

Cake/10
Portal is seriously fun and slightly challenging. Replaying it never gets old.
Classic game. if you love to have fun then this is the game!

Portal is a good game. It is short and the story seems like a whole story. The game play is extremely fun and i have a great time whenever a play it. GLaDOS is a vary funny character and a well written one as well. Overall i recommend portal and you just play it because it should be more then $10.
A classic puzzle game full of thinking in 3 dimensions! If you aren't a puzzle person this game is probably your best bet for great puzzle games! 9/10 no cake
Good game, play this first before portal 2 10/10
